title: Durarara!! - Shizuo Heiwajima Peeping Book: 24hours (Doujinshi)
description:
A three-part series that follow Shizuo for 24 hours.

V.1 - Morning
Details Shizuo's morning routine from waking up to getting ready for work.

V.2 - Daytime
Shizuo encounters a dog and a flea.

V.3 - Night
Shizuo contemplates his smoking problem.
